entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
